name: CultureJumpMonkey
description:
Be a clever monkey on your way to save your friend animals and run from the humans and other enemies. You will also encounter areas of culture heritage that are under threat and you'll learn about what causes this, what can be done and how you are affected as well.   

Game Design: Michael
Coding: Timur
2D Art: Pebbles and more
Sound Design: Audiowall/dillanhoyos and Ctdeken
Music: Steven and more
